page.title: 16ANOTHER ADULT'S DAY
page.content: THIS WAS WRITTEN BY A SECOND YEAR PUPIL AT THE DIDCOT GIRLS' SCHOOL. MY MOTHER GETS UP AT 6.30,GETS WASHED,GETS DRESSED, GOES DOWNSTAIRS TO PREPARE BREAKFAST AND WASHES THE DISHES.SHE DOES HER HAIR,GOES DOWN THE ROAD TO CATCH THE BUS TO GO TO WORK AND STARTS WORK AT 8 A.M..SHE GETS CLEANING EQUIPMENT AND HOOVERS OFFICES,COLLECTS THE RUBBISH THEN GOES TO DINNER.AFTER DINNER SHE BRUSHES THE FLOORS.SHE GOES HOME AT 2.30 P.M.,AND REACHES HOME AT 2.45 P.M.,MAKES A CUP OF TEA AND PREPARES DINNER.AFTER DINNER AT 6.30 P.M. SHE WASHES THE DISHES AND CLEANS THE KITCHEN,THEN GOES AND CUTS THE GRASS.THEN SHE GOES TO VISIT A FRIEND OR RELATIVE .SHE COMES HOME,MAKES SANDWICHES FOR THE NEXT DAY,HAS SUPPER, WATCHES THE TELEVISION AND GOES TO BED AT 11.30 P.M..
